FezBridge is a Android Debug Bridge (ADB) implementation for FEZ Devices.

= Introduction =

FezBridge is ported from the [http://code.google.com/p/microbridge MicroBridge] for Arduino. 
It is programmed in .NETMF and runs on FEZ devices from GHI electronics, like the FEZ Domino. Other devices like FEZ Panda needs a small hardware modification to support USB host mode.


= Details =

At the moment FezBridge is a work in progress.
